thread.title: The voice of ‘Hey Arnold’ is now hot as hell | New York Post
thread.title_full: The voice of ‘Hey Arnold’ is now hot as hell | New York Post

author: Hayley Richardson, The Sun
title: The voice of ‘Hey Arnold’ is now hot as hell | New York Post
text:
Remember that classic 90s cartoon “Hey Arnold?”
The main character was a lovable lad with a football-shaped head, wild yellow hair, and was never seen without his trusty baseball cap.
The voice behind the lead character is that of actor Lane Toran, who also lent his dulcet tones to Wolfgang and Jacques.
But the voiceover star couldn’t look more different to his cartoon alter ego – especially now that he’s all grown up.
Toran is now a model, a musician and proud owner of a sexy hipster beard.
And his success didn’t stop at “Hey Arnold.”
Toran went on to voice other characters in the Disney universe as well as “Jimmy Neutron: Boy Genius.”
He also had parts in “The Rugrats” and “Malcolm in the Middle.”
Excitingly, he’s set to star in the upcoming flick “Hey Arnold: The Jungle Movie.” — as Wolfgang though, not Arnold.
According to his Instagram account, Toran enjoys posing on cars, playing with his cat and looking deep and meaningfully into the distance in fields of hay bales.
